Tender Announcement
======================

### Request for Standing Offer: Utilities Maintenance

#### Bidder Requirements

*   The bidder must be qualified to provide utilities maintenance services.
*   The bidder must provide all necessary labour, supervision, materials (including fuel), equipment, maintenance, and competent operators.
*   The bidder must be able to provide services on an "as and when required" basis.

#### Contract Details

| Field Name        | Details                                                 | Field Name        | Details                              |
| :---------------- | :------------------------------------------------------ | :---------------- | :------------------------------------ |
| Contract Type     | Standing Offer                                             | Contract Type     | Standing Offer                           |
| UNSPSC            | Underground utilities construction service               | UNSPSC            | Underground utilities construction service          |
| Trade Agreements  | Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)                     | Trade Agreements  | Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)                     |
| Regions of Opportunity |                   | Regions of Opportunity | Manitoba                              |
| Delivery Regions  | Manitoba                                                    | Delivery Regions  | Manitoba                               |
| Contract Closing Date | May 1, 2024 2:00 PM EDT                               | Contract Closing Date | May 1, 2024 2:00 PM EDT                         |
| Notice URL        | https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19407313               | Notice URL        | https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19407313                 |
| Contact Info      | Matthew Virakorn (SPAC/PSPC) matthew.virakorn@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca                | Contact Info      | Matthew Virakorn (SPAC/PSPC) matthew.virakorn@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca            |

### Contract Description

The Department of National Defence (DND) at Canadian Forces Base / Area Support Unit Shilo (CFB Shilo) is seeking to enter into a Standing Offer Agreement (SOA) for utilities maintenance services. The successful bidder will be required to provide all necessary labour, supervision, materials, equipment, maintenance, and competent operators.

### Bid Submission Requirements

*   Bidders must submit all required supporting documentation by May 1, 2024, at 12:00 PM EDT.
*   Bids submitted after 2:00 PM EDT may be declared non-responsive.

Please visit the SAP Ariba Discovery posting at https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19407313 for complete details.        bid
